extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: This card cannot be Special Summoned. When this card is Tributed Summoned successfully, you can remove from play up to 5 FIRE monsters in your Graveyard. Destroy a number of Spell or Trap cards on the field equal to the number of cards remove from play by this effect.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Effect: When this card is sent to the graveyard as a result of battle, you can Special Summon 1 FIRE monster with an attack of 1500 or less in face-up Attack Position from your deck. Then shuffle your deck.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Effect: As long as this card is face-up on the field, increase the ATK of all FIRE monsters by 500 points and decrease the ATK of all WATER monsters by 400 points.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Effect: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned by removing 1 FIRE monster in your Graveyard from play. When this card destroys your opponent''s monster and sends it to the Graveyard as a result of battle, inflict 1500 points of damage to your opponent''s Life Points.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Effect: When this card is Special Summoned from the Graveyard, the controller of this card draws 1 card.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Effect: This card cannot be attacked if there is another Pyre-Type monster on your side of the field. This card inflicts 500 points of damage to your opponent''s Life Points during the End Phase of your turn.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Effect: Increase the ATK of this card by 1000 points for each FIRE monster on the field other than this card. Send a FIRE monster other than this card to the Graveyard to inflict 500 points of damage to your opponent’s Life Points.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Effect: This card can attack your opponent''s Life Points directly. Each time this card successfully attacks directly, increase the ATK of this card by 1000 points.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Effect: When this card is Tribute Summoned successfully, randomly discard 1 card from your opponent''s hand to the Graveyard. If the discarded card was a Monster Card, inflict damage to your opponent''s Life Points equal to the Level of the monster x 100 points.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Effect: You can tribute up to 2 Pyro-Type Monsters on your side of the field. If you do this, increase the ATK of this monster by the number of Tributed monsters x 1000 points. When this card attacks with an ATK that is higher than the DEF of your opponent''s Defense Position monster, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent''s Life Points. Destroy this card during the End Phase.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Effect: During the End Phase of a turn when this face-up card was destroyed as a result of battle, Special Summon this card from the Graveyard to your side of the field. This card cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Take control of a monster on your opponent''s side of the field that is equipped with this card. Increase your opponent''s Life Points by 1000 points during each of his/her Standby Phases.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card on the field.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Increases the ATK of all FIRE monsters by 500 points and decreases their DEF by 400 points.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Destroy 1 face-down monster and remove it from play. If the monster is a Flip Effect Monster, both players must check their respective Decks and remove all monsters of the same name from play. Then shuffle the Decks.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Pay 800 Life Points. Select 1 monster from your Graveyard, Special Summon it on the field in face-up Attack Position, and equip it with this card. When this card is destroyed, destroy the equipped monster.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Discard 1 card from your hand. Select 1 monster and destroy it.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Destroy all Spell and Trap Cards on the field.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Each time damage, except Battler Danage, is inflicted to your opponent''s Life Points, inflict 300 points of damage to your opponent''s Life Points. This card''s effect is not applied to the effect of Dark Room of Nightmare.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Add your hand to your Deck and shuffle it. Then draw the same number of cards that you added to your deck.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: All face-up Level 4 or higher monsters on the field are changed to Defense Position and remain in Defense Position as long as this card is active.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value:
When a monster on your side of the field equipped with this card is destroyed as a result of battle, and this card is sent to the Graveyard, select and activate 1 of the following effects:
- Draw 1 card from your deck.
- Randomly discard 1 card from your opponent''s hand to the Graveyard.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Inflict 1000 points of Damage to your opponent''s life Points. You cannot Activate this card if your opponent''s life points are 3000 or less.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card on your opponent’s side of the field. You can then Set 1 Spell or Trap Card from your hand.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Select 1 monster from your Graveyard and Special Summon it in face-up Attack Position. When this card is removed from the field, destroy the monster. When the monster is destroyed, destroy this card.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value:
Select and activate 1 of the following effects:
- Negate the activation and the effect of a Spell Card that targets 1 monster on the field and destroy the Spell Card.
- Send 1 Spell Card from your hand to the Graveyard to negate the activation and the effect of a Spell Card and destroy it.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: When a FIRE monster on your side of the field is destroyed and sent to the graveyard, inflict 500 points of damage to your opponent''s Life Points.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value:
Each Structure Deck: Blaze of Destruction contains:
• 1 Preconstructed Deck of 40 cards
• 1 Ultra Rare
• 39 Commons
• 1 Rulebook
• 1 Dueling Guide
• 1 Playmat

results.cleanName: Blaze of Destruction and Fury From the Deep Structure Deck Display Box

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Each display contains 5 sealed Blaze of Destruction Structure Decks and 5 sealed Fury from the Deep Structure Decks for 10 total decks.

results.name: Blaze of Destruction & Fury From the Deep Structure Deck Display Box
